title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted purple silk ornamented with cut steel beads in lattice pattern; linked steel beads and fringe at each end; one simple steel ring controls side closing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, steel
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-90.
